statusLine.command: input=$(cat); session_id=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.session_id'); transcript_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.transcript_path'); if [ -f "$transcript_path" ]; then session_start=$(stat -f %B "$transcript_path" 2>/dev/null || stat -c %Y "$transcript_path" 2>/dev/null || echo 0); current_time=$(date +%s); session_duration=$((current_time - session_start)); hours=$((session_duration / 3600)); minutes=$(((session_duration % 3600) / 60)); token_count=$(wc -c < "$transcript_path" | awk '{print int($1/4)}'); printf "⏱️ %dh%02dm | 🎯 ~%dk tokens" $hours $minutes $((token_count / 1000)); else printf "⏱️ New session | 🎯 0 tokens"; fi
